name: Little Pluto's Peril
description:
Sneak your way around the house as you try to make your way to safety! But beware as two villainous figures are stalking your every move.

Created for the Edgar Allan Poe Game Jam

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

[W][A][S][D] = Move

[Shift] = Sprint

[Mouse] = Look around

[Space] = Interact

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming by JungaBoon

Models and Levels by Curtis Paulk
